contents:
failed voices who think they know everything and understand everyone


Right. America is established by the spirit of humble, the insecurity about human rationalism. It is the true wisdom keeping the land great. 

"The fear of Jehovah is the beginning of wisdom; And the knowledge of the Holy One is understanding. "

SImilarly, it is ruined by the pride and ignorance, imaging that human can manage the world without the guidance of god. 

Pride is much more serious than other fleshly desire. It is the source of all sin, because it templates Adam and Eve. Satan says it is wisdom, but actually lead them further from true wisdom.

You traitor, selling the conscience to devil, as well as those Democrats, will die like judas, with stomach flowing out in the field——if not repent.

You don't have the right to enjoy the America made great again by Trump in the future.
